request.description: Register a new job seeker with optional photo upload. Use multipart/form-data. Required: email, password, firstName, lastName. Optional: photo, description, skills, gender, dateOfBirth, idNumber, contactNumber, maritalStatus, location, city, country, references, experience, jobCategoryId. Returns user info with profile (no password). A welcome email will be sent to the registered email address. Photo must be an image file under 5MB.
